en.pageSubtitle: Maru Company's Leadership Driving Innovation and Growth

ceoSection.title: CEO's Message
ceoSection.greeting: Hello, I am CEO Kwon of Maru Company.
ceoSection.message1: Maru Company continuously embraces new challenges, adapting to a rapidly changing world with creative innovation and customer-centric values.
ceoSection.message2: Since our founding, we have strived to deliver tangible value to our customers through technological and service innovation, always prioritizing â€˜trustâ€™ and â€˜quality.â€™
ceoSection.message3: We promise to further strengthen our competitiveness in the global market and to continue offering innovative solutions and differentiated services as a trusted partner for our customers.
ceoSection.signature: Sincerely, CEO Kwon of Maru Company
ceoSection.name: Oh-Hyung Kwon
